method: Preheat the oven to 180C/350F/Gas 5. Using a pestle and mortar or wooden spoon and bowl, pound together the fresh mint, fresh rosemary and the garlic, then mix with 1 tbsp olive oil. Smear over four lean lamb chops or cutlets. Place the aubergine, courgette and red or yellow pepper on to a baking sheet. Drizzle with 1 tbsp olive oil and place the lamb chops on top. Bake in the oven for 20-25 minutes. Top the chops with feta cheese and add the cherry tomatoes to the pan. Cook for a further 10 minutes until the cheese just starts to brown. Serve the chops with the roasted vegetables, toasted ciabatta bread and mixed leaf salad.
ingredients: 4 lean lamb chops or cutlets,  1 tbsp, fresh mint,  1 tbsp, fresh rosemary,  2 cloves garlic,  2 tbsp olive oil,  1 small aubergine, sliced,  1 courgette, sliced,  1 red or yellow pepper, cut in large chunks,  50g/2oz feta cheese, crumbled,  250g/9oz cherry tomatoes
